People of NIT A

/capturing the spirit of NIT Agartala, one story at a time/

STORIES KNOW US

Who Are We?

People of NITA is a community for the students of NIT Agartala.

Our main aim with this project is to document the uncaptured stories of the people that set their feet in this college.

We believe that everyone has a story to tell. We want to build a home for these stories and hopefully build a sense of belonging through this community.

We want to be a river for the hundreds of boats that are peoples‚Äô stories. Allow us to be a medium for the story that you‚Äôve always wanted to put out before the world but couldn‚Äôt.
